Question
========
Consider a ball that is thrown upwards and which then falls back down. If up is the positive direction, then the ball's velocity

Answerlist
----------
* is always positive.
* is always negative.
* starts positive, then becomes negative.
* starts negative, then becomes positive.

Solution
========
When the ball is moving upwards, its velocity is positive. When the ball is moving downwards, its velocity is negative.
